Class Window

java.lang.Object
io.github.kale_ko.gighm.rendering.Window
public class Window extends Object
A window for rendering to and managing input

1.0.0

    • Window

      public Window(@NotNull Renderer renderer, @NotNull String title, @NotNull Integer width, @NotNull Integer height) throws ThreadPauseException
      Create a window
      Parameters:
      renderer - The renderer being used by the window
      title - The title of the window
      width - The width of the window
      height - The height of the window
      Throws:
      ThreadPauseException - If the main thread can't be paused
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • Window

      public Window(@NotNull Renderer renderer, @NotNull String title, @NotNull Integer width, @NotNull Integer height, @NotNull Boolean maximized, @NotNull Boolean resizable) throws ThreadPauseException
      Create a window
      Parameters:
      renderer - The renderer being used by the window
      title - The title of the window
      width - The width of the window
      height - The height of the window
      maximized - Weather the window should be maximized
      resizable - Weather the window should be resizable
      Throws:
      ThreadPauseException - If the main thread can't be paused
      Since:
      1.7.0
